text: ql -ayha alnabii mutawajihaan 'iilaa rabik baldea'-: ya man lak almalik klluh, 'ant aldhy tamnah almalik walmal waltmkyn fi al'ard man tasha' min khlqk, wtslb almulk miman tsha', wthb aleizat fi aldunya walakhirat man tsha', wtjel aldhllat ealaa min tsha', biadik alkhyr, 'iinak -whdk- ealaa kl shay' qdyr. wafi alayat 'iithbat lsft alyad lilah taealaa ealaa ma ylyq bih sbhanh
